scripts.apigen: openapi-generator  generate  --import-mappings AchievementKey --import-mappings Role --import-mappings ThreadType --import-mappings Dota_GameMode --import-mappings MatchmakingMode=1 --import-mappings BanReason=1 --import-mappings Dota2Version --skip-validate-spec -i https://dotaclassic.ru/api/api-json -g typescript-fetch -t ./.openapi-generator/typescript-fetch-swr -o ./generated --additional-properties useSingleRequestParameter=false && rm -rf src/api/back && cp -r ./generated src/api/back && rm -rf ./generated && node scripts/after-codegen.js && next lint --fix
scripts.apigen:local: openapi-generator  generate  --import-mappings Dota_Map --import-mappings DotaConnectionState --import-mappings DotaGameRulesState --import-mappings AchievementKey --import-mappings Role --import-mappings ThreadType --import-mappings Dota_GameMode --import-mappings MatchmakingMode=1 --import-mappings BanReason=1 --import-mappings Dota2Version --skip-validate-spec -i http://localhost:6001/api-json -g typescript-fetch -t ./.openapi-generator/typescript-fetch-swr -o ./generated --additional-properties useSingleRequestParameter=false && rm -rf src/api/back && cp -r ./generated src/api/back && rm -rf ./generated && node scripts/after-codegen.js && next lint --fix
scripts.docker: docker build . --build-arg API_URL=https://dotaclassic.ru/api -t dota2classic/matchmaking:dotabuff && docker push dota2classic/matchmaking:dotabuff
